CHAT.comment: Time is 15:00 , FAT and Chi play well together , but they don't talk to each other a lot. EXP stays in the background. For the most part , FAT and Chi spend the activity building different towers. Chi leads the activities , and Fat takes a mild interest in the activity. Discussion dealing with the magnetic qualities of the object is limited to a question Chi asks about why the yellow wand is pulling and a comment made by Fat that there's metal in the balls. Chi's question is not answered , or acknowledged. Chi does a little experimenting: she notices that the turtle and a nickel are not magnetic.

g.ga: plastic box which contains the objects

u.a: objects for the magnet activity are on the couch; Fat sits on the couch next to the objects and Chi is on the floor in front of the couch , facing the objects for the magnet activity

removes the nut from one side of the black base and places it closer to her
